Cosmos University: Religions Databank

This Databank contains entries on one hundred and eighteen religions and lists their historical information, rituals, pantheons, and any other associated metaphysical properties. This information is currently being gathered and curated as we accumulate it. We anticipate many additions as we work through various histories.


If you're interested in helping create this databank:
  • Look for any incorrect data
  • Suggest data fields we could add
  • Suggest religions we may have missed
  • Suggest links we may have missed (religion influence, inspiration, etc)
  • If you'd like to help, please join our Discord and make suggestions in the databanks -> #religions channel
